homePage.title: Organize Your Job Applications Effortlessly
homePage.description: Stay on top of your job search with ease and efficiency.

loginPage.welcomeText1: Track your job applications, organize opportunities, and optimize your job search with our intuitive platform.
loginPage.welcomeText2: Create personalized tracking boards and receive reminders for interviews.
loginPage.welcomeText3: Join us today and take control of your career!
loginPage.title: Login
loginPage.description: Enter your email below to login to your account.
loginPage.errorMessageUnexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
loginPage.errorMessageLogin: Email or password incorect. Please try again.

forgotPasswordPage.resetPswdModalDescription: Enter your email below, an email will be sent with a link to reset your password.
forgotPasswordPage.errorMessageResetPswd: Please enter a valid email address.
forgotPasswordPage.resetPswdModalSuccessMessage:
Your password reset request has been successfully received. If the email address associated with your account is correct, you will soon receive an email containing a secure link to reset your password.

Please check your inbox and spam folder.

If you did not initiate this request, please ignore this email or contact us immediately.

resetPasswordPage.resetPswdModalDescription: Enter your email below, an email will be sent with a link to reset your password.
resetPasswordPage.errorMessageResetPswd: Please enter a valid email address.
resetPasswordPage.resetPswdModalSuccessMessage:
Your password reset request has been successfully received. If the email address associated with your account is correct, you will soon receive an email containing a secure link to reset your password.

Please check your inbox and spam folder.

If you did not initiate this request, please ignore this email or contact us immediately.
resetPasswordPage.tokenErrorMessage: Invalid or expired token. Please try again later.

signUpPage.title: Sign Up
signUpPage.description: Please fill in the fields below to complete your registration.
signUpPage.errorEmailInput: Please enter a valid email address.
signUpPage.errorSignUpMessage: An error occurred during registration. Please try again later.
signUpPage.errorOTPEmail: An error occurred while sending the email. Please try again later.
signUpPage.errorOTPMessage: Incorrect OTP code. Please try again.
signUpPage.errorConfirmPasswordMessage: The password and confirmation do not match.

OTPDialog.title: OTP Validation Code
OTPDialog.description: Please enter the code provided in the email you received.
OTPDialog.successMessage: Your account is now active. You will be redirected to the login page in a few seconds.
